createTables.createCategoriesTable: CREATE TABLE categories (id serial, category_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, category_id serial, category_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, category_description text, category_start_date timestamp with time zone, category_image oid, CONSTRAINT pk_category_id PRIMARY KEY (category_id), CHECK (category_position_in_list > 0));
createTables.createSubcategoriesTable: CREATE TABLE subcategories (id serial, subcategory_name varchar(50) NOT NULL, subcategory_id serial, subcategory_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, subcategory_description text, subcategory_start_date timestamp with time zone, subcategory_image_name varchar(1000), subcategory_image oid, subcategory_parent_id bigint REFERENCES categories(category_id)  ON UPDATE CASCADE  ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT pk_subcategory_id PRIMARY KEY (subcategory_id), CHECK (subcategory_position_in_list > 0));
createTables.createProductsTable: CREATE TABLE products (product_description text NOT NULL, product_specification text, product_pricesType json NOT NULL, product_price json NOT NULL, product_photosUrls text NOT NULL, product_discounts text, product_discountsValues json, product_brand_id bigint REFERENCES brands(brand_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE  ON DELETE CASCADE, product_stock bool DEFAULT(FALSE), product_quantityStock bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantityOrders bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantitySendItems bigint DEFAULT(0), product_quantityPaidItems bigint DEFAULT(0), product_raiting float4 DEFAULT(0), product_barcode bigint, product_start_date varchar(200) NOT NULL, product_end_date varchar(200), CONSTRAINT pk_product_id PRIMARY KEY ( product_id ), CHECK (product_position_in_list > 0), CHECK (product_quantityStock => 0), CHECK (product_quantityOrders => 0), CHECK (product_quantityPaidItems => 0), CHECK (product_quantitySendItems => 0));
createTables.createSliderTable: CREATE TABLE slider (id serial, slider_position_in_list bigint NOT NULL, slider_name varchar(2500), slider_description varchar(2500), slider_url varchar(2500), slider_display bool DEFAULT(FALSE), slider_id serial, slider_image_name varchar(1000) NOT NULL UNIQUE, slider_image oid NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT pk_slider_id PRIMARY KEY (slider_id));
